title: uLLadu paramporuLE
sahitya:
uLLadu paramporuLE inda uNmai arindukoNDAl panmathat-tollaiyillai


anupallavi

  teLLat-teLindiDum dhyAna samAdhiyil tEjOnmayamAna divya svarUpamAi


caraNam    kAraik-kaTTiDamillai kal shemburuvumillai kaTTu kANikkaiyennum bhaTTarum angillai
pArellAm kOyilAipparandu nirainda parAparanukkum namakkum tarakaronrillaiyE
